titleStmt.title: An ordinance for indempnitie to the English Protestants of the province of Munster in Ireland
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

notesStmt.note: "Tuesday August 1, 1654. Ordered by His Highness the Lord Protector and his council that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Henry Scobell, clerk of the council."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
